summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1183, for the improvement of Mercer Street, from Dexter Avenue to Westlake Avenue; Westlake Avenue, from Republican Street to Mercer Street; Eighth Avenue North, from Harrison Street to Roy Street; and Dexter Avenue, from Roy Street to Republican Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein sewers of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, lamp holes, catch basins and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 13076 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
